url.description: The URL to be encoded in the QR code

attachDruid.description: If true, add druid url param with current druid

showTitle.description: If true, show 'QR Code:' above the QR code

userSustainTimeout.description: Seconds to wait before taking back control over the sustain pedal

mode.description: Mode of operation for the sliders. linearClamped: linear mapping of input to output, if one of the output bounds is closer to the midpoint than the other, the closer one's value is clamped. proportional: if one of the output bounds is closer to the midpoint than the other, the closer one takes less travel from the midpoint to reach.
